name: Betrayed
short_description:
Betrayed is a first person shooter with high textures and a good gameplay.
All done by just 3 Teen-Developers!
With our high textures 'Betrayed' makes it possible to enjoy the future gaming in Open-Source!
Bringing the best shooter in the world!
